entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-12-21
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • running "Convert to GeneratedRegexAttribute" fixer wants to fix all kinds of other things #79892
  • GeneratedRegex fixer forces pattern onto a single line #79891
  • DirectoryNotFoundException on iOS due to case mismatch #79889
  • [API Proposal]: Add Volatile.Write(ref char, char) and char Volatile.Read(ref char) #79888
  • [mono] Test System.Text.Tests.EncodingExtensionsTests.GetBytes_Encoding_ReadOnlySequence_IBufferWriter_LargeMultiSegment takes too long #79883
  • Array might not be zero-initialized #79882
    8.0.0
  • Consider upgrading Xcode version on .NET performance pipelines #79879
    8.0.0
  • EntryPointNotFoundException when having a dependency with the same name as a Windows DLL #79878
  • emcc received SIGKILL #79874
  • Can StringInfo performance be improved? #79873
  • .NET 7, Linux, SSL connection is being reused between independent HttpClients? #79869
  • [API Proposal]: Add ConsoleModifiers.None and ConsoleKey.None #79868
    8.0.0
  • Some culture tests failing on latest Windows 11 builds #79867

Closed

  • Improving ARM64 Performance in .NET 5.0 – Closing the gap with x64 #35853
    Future
  • Will calling HttpResponse.WriteAsync() cause HttpResponse.HasStarted to be set to true #79893
  • [Perf] Changes at 3/21/2021 5:03:52 PM #50737
    8.0.0
  • [ARM] LSRA heuristic tuning #56978
    Future
  • RegEx support for ranges outside of Basic Multilingual Plane #79865
  • GenerateHWIntrinsicTests_Arm/project.assets.json already exists #79843
  • IHost.RunAsync() does not exit on CTRL_+C #79851
  • `MemoryMappedViewAccessor.WriteArray` throws uncatchable `System.AccessViolationException` when used to write to a very large `MemoryMappedFile` on a memory-constrained ARM embedded Linux system. #79832
    8.0.0
  • Test failure JIT.HardwareIntrinsics.General._Vector256.VectorUnaryOpTest__ConvertToDoubleUInt64.ValidateResult(UInt64[], Double[], System.String) #78576
    8.0.0
  • [NativeAOT] SIGABRT Crash in System.Security.Cryptography.OpenSsl.Tests #79619
  • Add a feature on Utf8JsonReader to skip validation when reading #78159
    Future
  • System.Collections.Immutable version 7.0.0 warns about not supporting .net 7.0 #79756
  • Create APIs to deal with processing ASCII text (as bytes) #28230
    8.0.0
  • System.IO.Ports.SerialPort not working on Linux arm64 #74332
    Future
  • Failures in checked/release asm diffs #79560
    8.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • [STJ SourceGen] Use Roslyn4.4 target when testing #79890
    area-System.Text.Json
  • [wasm] Asserts for externaly configured assets, more pendingDownload #79886
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 8.0.0
  • Disable outerloop tests on mono/mobile and fix timeout in sendtohelixhelp.proj #79885
  • Update WasmBase::IsSupported not to use backing field #79884
    arch-wasm
  • Prefix exported symbols defined via EntryPoint of UnmanagedCallersOnl… #79880
    area-Codegen-AOT-mono
  • Sync ILLink to latest commits #79871
    linkable-framework, area-Tools-ILLink, 8.0.0
  • [release/7.0] Prevent warning for implicit ILCompiler reference #79870
    Servicing-consider, area-NativeAOT-coreclr

Merged

  • Switch to the new ARM64 Helix queues #77764
    area-Infrastructure
  • Fix deviating XMLDoc for HostingEnvExtensions #79708
    area-Extensions-Hosting, community-contribution
  • Avoid a race condition in restoring the GenerateHWIntrinsicTests_* projects #79861
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Update packaging.targets #79881
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Remove Mono SpanHelpers workaround #79821
    area-System.Memory, 8.0.0
  • Fix class summary #79872
    area-Extensions-Configuration, community-contribution
  • New ASCII APIs #75012
    area-System.Buffers, new-api-needs-documentation, 8.0.0
  • Remove bash dependency from init-compiler #77304
    area-Infrastructure, community-contribution
  • Fix build for DUMP_GC_TABLES defined in Release #79835
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix Checked/Release asm diffs #79844
    area-CodeGen-coreclr

Updated

  • Add nullability to `CreateInstance` in `TypeDescriptor`/`TypeDescriptionProvider` to match `Activator.CreateInstance` #79776
    area-System.ComponentModel, community-contribution
  • Fix size regression from enum sorting #79845
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Allow preinitializing types with canonical forms #79384
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Add sourcegen support for required & init-only properties. #79828
    area-System.Text.Json, 8.0.0
  • Add 7 more specialized frozen collection types. #79794
    area-System.Collections
  • CallSiteRuntimeResolver. VisitFactory method implements adding IsInstanceOfType check #79232
    area-Extensions-DependencyInjection, no-recent-activity, community-contribution, needs-author-action
  • Remaining feedback from ILLink merge #79677
    area-Tools-ILLink, 8.0.0
  • Make System.Reflection.Emit public types abstract #78544
    area-System.Reflection.Emit, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Create analyzer in ComInterfaceGenerator to enforce the generator is used with IUnknown only #78189
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices
  • Move remaining HIR SIMDIntrinsics to SimdAsHWIntrinsic #79720
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add initial support for Freebsd.arm64 #71486
    arch-arm64, os-freebsd, area-PAL-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Implementation of Lemire's nearly divisionless method #79790
    area-System.Runtime, community-contribution
  • Avoid delegate allocation in generic cycle detector #79842
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [mono] Introduce designated direct pinvokes to mono aot compiler #79721
    area-Codegen-AOT-mono
  • Fix CngKey.KeySize for keys in the Platform Crypto Provider #77809
    area-System.Security
  • [mono][wasm] Bundle assemblies as WebCIL #79416
    arch-wasm, area-AssemblyLoader-mono
  • createdump: only dump committed memory #79853
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr, community-contribution
  • More preparation for JIT\Regression test merging #79697
    test-enhancement, area-CodeGen-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • [release/6.0] [mono][interp] Add unbox when calling valuetype method through delegate #79819
    Servicing-approved, area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono, 6.0.x
  • Allow Base64Decoder to ignore space chars, add IsValid methods and tests #79334
    area-System.Memory, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • WIP: Create AND chains in bool optimizer pass #79283
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [wasm] optional legacy JS interop #79622
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 8.0.0
  • [wasm] Convert exception messages to resource #79754
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 8.0.0
  • [mono] Fix crash when GetDelegateForFunctionPointer is passed non delegate type #79744
    area-VM-meta-mono, community-contribution
  • Equalize committed space in free regions and move regions to global free list #77597
    area-GC-coreclr
  • [draft][wasi] compile with libs.native #79046
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, 8.0.0
  • [release/7.0] [mono][aot] Fixed decompose_flag propagation issues #79855
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • Process.Unix: while reaping all processes, handle encountering direct children. #79817
    area-System.Diagnostics.Process, community-contribution
  • [wasm] mount VFS archive instead of copying it to MEMFS #79506
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript
  • [release/7.0] Make DacValidateMD more resilient to invalid MethodDesc #79862
    Servicing-consider, area-Diagnostics-coreclr

entry.title: dotnet/runtimelab - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-12-21
entry.content:
Issues

Closed

  • NativeAOT-LLVM: package publishing is not working #2120

Updated

  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] Publishing Hello World for WebAssembly target on Windows arm64 fails #2121
  • [Bug] [NativeAOT-LLVM]: Unable to compile native WebAssembly library #2073

PullRequests

Merged

  • Fix publishing of RID-agnostic packages #2135
  • NativeAOT-LLVM: Change image for NetCore1ESPool-Internal pool to windows.vs2019.amd64 #2134

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-12-21
entry.content:
Issues

Closed

  • Unable to create NUPKG for Azure Function (EventHubTrigger) --> Microsoft.NET.Sdk.Functions package causing silent killer. #29639
  • "dotnet test" duration is broken with .NET 6 Preview 2 #16402
  • Attempting to codesign a MacOS app corrupts the app #24337
  • Broken parameters passing in dotnet CLI 7.0.100 #29396
  • .NET 7.0.100 `dotnet test` cannot parse MSBuild switches from .rsp or command line if .NET CLI language is not `en` #28975

Updated

  • BitConverter.GetBytes is incompatible with INumber<T> #29240
  • Dotnet test in multiplatform docker build #29308
  • Test project for .NET 7 Android project not working. #29172
    Discussion
  • Add option to specify environment from testenvironments.json on CLI #29516
  • dotnet test does no longer accept a project path after updating to NET 7.0.101 #29543

PullRequests

Created

  • [DO NOT MERGE] [release/7.0.1xx] Inverted language version conditions in console / classlib templates to support new language features for newer language versions #29636
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.2xx' => 'main' #29629
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Move Template Discovery Test from dotnet/templating to dotnet/sdk #29628
    Area-Infrastructure

Merged

  • Update Verify and Verify.Diffplex #29623
    Area-Infrastructure, Area-Templates
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.2xx' => 'main' #29585
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Change .templateengine folder path #29449
    Area-Infrastructure, Area-dotnet new
  • Fix publish test TFMs #29627
    Area-ILLink
  • Use linker matching TFM #29441
    Area-ILLink

Updated

  • Unskip `Publish_HostedApp_WithoutTrimming_Works` #29640
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 140: Build ID 2071659 #29624
    Area-Infrastructure
  • fix locale-sensitive comparison of UnmatchedArgument error strings #29559
    Area-DotNet Test
  • Add net8.0 ILCompiler tests #29393
    Area-ILLink

entry.title: dotnet/csharplang - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-12-21
entry.content:
Issues

Updated

  • Champion: "&&= and ||= assignment operators" #1718
    Likely Never

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-12-21
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Unexpected "delegate type could not be inferred" error for a Color Color scenario #66096
  • Add `Make property required` codefix for `CS8618` #66089
  • ChangeSignatureCodeRefactoring encountered an Error #66086
  • When a diagnostic is disabled by default, updating the rule does not enable it #66085

Closed

  • Combination of MethodImpl and ref parameters confused IDE0060 rule #65062
  • `async` and `required` should be mutually exclusive #66088
  • Negated is-expression doesn't work with list patterns #65876
    17.5
  • Writes through `UnscopedRef` allows bypassing lifetime rules #65648
    17.5

PullRequests

Created

  • Account for SpecificDiagnosticOptions in analyzer driver checks for enabling a disabled by default rule #66087
    Area-Analyzers, Area-Compilers
  • Implement Required Members for VB #66084
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Required Members
  • Create a README for CLaSP #66083
    Area-IDE

Merged

  • Merge main to release/dev17.6 #66095
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge main to release/dev17.6 #66032
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Merge Conflicts
  • Fix typo in error message #66094
    Area-IDE, Community, Next
  • Split out ref safety analysis into a separate pass after binding #64928
    Area-Compilers, Next
  • Use the inner pattern to recreate the decision DAG for is-expressions #65878
    Area-Compilers, Community, Next
  • Adjust calculation of invocation escape when return type is ref to ref struct #65857
    Area-Compilers, Next

Updated

  • Length-based switch dispatch #66081
    Area-Compilers, 17.5
  • Produce error when static local function captures a local with extension method method group conversion #65965
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Implement new lookup rules for Primary Constructor parameters #66054
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Primary Constructors
  • Emit and report missing `Decimal-` and `DateTimeConstantAttribute` #65777
    Area-Compilers
  • Correctly parse local function with several async modifiers #66030
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Block `default(delegate*<void>...enum)` in attributes #66073
    Area-Compilers
  • Support netmodules in `MetadataReference` factory methods #66076
    Area-Compilers
  • Enable switch dispatch for is-expressions #65874
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • [WIP] Implementation of new Visitors, Walkers and Rewriters as laid out in #62647 #65139
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Fixes and improvements for Run Code Analysis command #66010
    Area-Analyzers
  • OptionKey clean-up and integration tests #66016
    Area-IDE
  • Option store #66069
    Area-IDE

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-12-21
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Will calling HttpResponse.WriteAsync() cause HttpResponse.HasStarted to be set to true #45719
  • WebApplicationFactory CreateClient throws DirectoryNotFound if solution and project in same directory #45717
  • Perf improvement: caching, plainTextSansFilter, plainTextSansFilter #45716
  • Blazor WASM debugging appears to work with Chrome, but not with Brave Browser #45714
  • Blazor: changing CascadingValue calls SetParametersAsync/OnParametersSet multiple times using nested components #45713
    Discussions
  • Reduce database queries for Identity UserClaimsPrincipalFactory and IRoleClaimStore #45712
  • Discussion, HeadContent development #45709
    Backlog
  • publish folder recursively #45708
  • Blazor circuit: test availability of Navigator.sendBeacon (JS) and make result readable to dotnet services #45707
    Backlog
  • The antiforgery token could not be decrypted. #45706
  • Additional Events for RateLimitOptions #45705
  • Perf improvement: endpoint, mapaction #45703
  • Support pnpm that installed using a standalone script in SpaProxyLaunchCommand #45700

Closed

  • Changing CSS in RCL forces app restart when using BlazorWebView #42871
    6.0.x
  • playwright Failed to download firefox #33527
    8.0-MQ
  • [Infrastructure] Limit browser installation to the environments where we use it #30241
    8.0-MQ
  • Perf regression: mvc #45704
  • Blazor Server App integrated with Azure AD: Public/Anonymous pages not working #45711
  • Pseudo-locales don't work in Blazor WebAssembly #42258
    .NET 8 Planning
  • [Blazor] Blazor Custom Elements tags evidently require a '-' #45701

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix cookie null regression #45715
    Servicing-consider, area-runtime, 7.0.x
  • Fix gRPC template tests #45702
    area-mvc, area-grpc

Merged

  • Update repro.md #45636
    8.0-preview1

Updated

  • Playwright 🎭 🛠️ #45682
    area-blazor, feature-templates, playwright 🎭
  • Add Name Attribute to EditForm component EditContext cascading parameter. Doing it capable to impleme… #45599
    area-blazor, community-contribution
  • [AOT] Fix Web UI AOT Warnings #45580
    area-blazor, 8.0-preview1
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 1159: Build ID 2071799 #45630
    area-mvc
  • [blazor][wasm] unify startup bit more #45628
    area-blazor, blazor-wasm, arch-wasm, 8.0
  • Fix DictionaryModelBinder null reference issue #45515
    area-web-frameworks
  • DefaultProblemDetailsWriter.CanWrite without Accept header #45158
    area-web-frameworks
  • Fix: Detect parsability when FromRoute attribute is used #45597
    area-infrastructure
  • Add ambiguous route analyzer #45582
    blocked, area-infrastructure, area-web-frameworks
  • Add Kestrel named pipes transport #44426
    area-runtime, blog-candidate
  • Compatibility Suppressions #45681
    area-infrastructure
  • [AOT] Fix runtime warnings #45604
    area-runtime
  • consider escaped commas in LDAP distinguished name #45649
    area-security, community-contribution
  • [release/6.0] Use new Arm64 Helix queues #45538
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 6.0.x

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-12-21
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Navigation bar overlaps title bar when replacing MainPage for a MAUI 6.0 Windows App #12255
  • Splash screen does not show when running in debugger #12254
  • Visual Studio Installer does not offer .NET Multi-platform App UI development workload #12251
  • (Un)SelectedTabColor do not work for TabbedPage icons (FontImageSource) on iOS #12250
  • I cannot access the Command Line arguments in Windows - MAUI #12246
  • MAUI Blazor Hybrid macOS does not react to [Tab] [Up] [Enter] keys etc. #12244
  • Stepper Value is incorrectly clamped to default min/max when using bindableproperties in MVVM pattern #12243
  • [ARM64] Fail to install 6.0 MAUI from latest public build with error "Workload installation failed: microsoft.android.sdk.darwin::32.0.482 is not found in NuGet feeds" #12242
  • RadionButton does not fill it's width in WinUI with ControlTemplate #12241
  • Maui Drawer #12240
  • ScrollView Content cannot scroll inside Grid #12236

Closed

  • Windows: Menu/ToolBar overlap window titlebar and buttons #10714
    Backlog

PullRequests

Created

  • Call mapcontainerview #12260
  • Connect gestures LifeCycle to Container and Window #12259
  • Allow CommunityToolkit to avoid reflection to access the CollectionView controller #12258
    community ✨
  • Update Essentials PhoneDialer API Docs #12253
    area/docs 📓, t/housekeeping ♻︎
  • Update Essentials Permissions API Docs #12252
    area/docs 📓, t/housekeeping ♻︎
  • Update Essentials OrientationSensor API Docs #12247
    area/docs 📓, t/housekeeping ♻︎
  • Update Essentials MediaPicker API Docs #12245
    area/docs 📓, t/housekeeping ♻︎

Updated

  • Fix Secondary Tap Scenarios on Android #10619
  • Micro benchmark fixes #12178
    area/perf 🏎️, community ✨
  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #12123
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/infrastructure 🏗️

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-12-21
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Query Best Practices for TPH and filtered data #29911
  • Pass query tracking behavior to materialization interceptor #29910
  • Materializer optimizations #29909
  • QueryContext.TryGetEntry for non-composite keys that doesn't create an array or box #29908
  • Lightweight fixup for identity resolution #29907
    Backlog
  • SaveChanges creates an empty Merge query statement, transactions are probably not garanteed, consequential damage: Microsoft.Data.SqlClient.SqlException (0x80131904): The MERGE statement conflicted with the FOREIGN KEY constraint #29905

Closed

  • Azure Function and Entity Framework Sql Server error - Could not load file or assembly Microsoft.Extensions.Logging.Abstractions, Version=7.0.0.0 #29883
  • Relational: Lifecycle hook for initializing a connection #14822
  • ExecuteUpdate error with Owned property #29906
  • UninitializedDbSetDiagnosticSuppressor doesn't work when the severity is set to Error #29904
  • DBNull shows up as a large negative value -9223372036854774807 automatically triggering DBConcurrencyException for Concurrency tokens #29900

PullRequests

Merged

  • Identity resolution for loading detached entities #29884

Updated

  • [release/7.0] Revert shared columns validation breaking change #29867
    Servicing-approved, 7.0.3
  • Fix to #29513 - Json: improve projection deduplication for scenarios containing collection indexers #29808

entry.content:
PullRequests

Created
